   20: -module(io_proto_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   23: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   24: 
   25: -export([setopts_getopts/1,unicode_options/1,unicode_options_gen/1, 
   26:          binary_options/1, read_modes_gl/1, logging_gl/1,
   27: 	 read_modes_ogl/1, broken_unicode/1,eof_on_pipe/1,
   28:          unicode_prompt/1, shell_slogan/1, raw_stdout/1, raw_stdout_isatty/1,
   29:          file_read_stdin_binary_mode/1, file_read_stdin_list_mode/1,
   30:          file_read_stdin_unicode_translation_error_binary_mode/1,
   31:          file_read_stdin_unicode_translation_error_list_mode/1,
   32:          file_read_line_stdin_cr_without_nl/1,
   33:          file_read_line_stdin_unicode_translation_error_binary_mode/1,
   34:          file_read_line_stdin_unicode_translation_error_list_mode/1,
   35:          io_get_chars_stdin_binary_mode/1, io_get_chars_stdin_list_mode/1,
   36:          io_get_until_stdin_binary_mode/1, io_get_until_stdin_list_mode/1,
   37:          io_get_chars_file_read_stdin_binary_mode/1,
   38:          file_read_stdin_latin1_binary_mode/1,
   39:          file_read_stdin_latin1_list_mode/1,
   40:          io_fwrite_stdin_latin1_mode/1
   41:         ]).
   42: 
   43: 
   44: -export([io_server_proxy/1,start_io_server_proxy/0, proxy_getall/1, 
   45: 	 proxy_setnext/2, proxy_quit/1]).
   46: %% For spawn
   47: -export([answering_machine1/3, answering_machine2/3]).
   48: 
   49: -export([uprompt/1, slogan/0, session_slogan/0]).
   50: 
   51: -export([write_raw_to_stdout/0, read_raw_from_stdin/1]).
   52: 
   53: -export([get_until_eof/2]).
   54: 
   55: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
   56: 
   57: %%-define(debug, true).
   58: 
   59: -ifdef(debug).
   60: -define(dbg(Data),io:format(standard_error, "DBG: ~p\r\n",[Data])).
   61: -else.
   62: -define(dbg(Data),noop).
   63: -endif.
   64: 
   65: suite() ->
   66:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   67:      {timetrap,{minutes,5}}].
   68: 
   69: all() -> 
   70:     [setopts_getopts, unicode_options, unicode_options_gen,
   71:      binary_options, read_modes_gl, read_modes_ogl, logging_gl,
   72:      broken_unicode, eof_on_pipe, unicode_prompt,
   73:      shell_slogan, raw_stdout, raw_stdout_isatty,
   74:      file_read_stdin_binary_mode,
   75:      file_read_stdin_list_mode,
   76:      file_read_stdin_unicode_translation_error_binary_mode,
   77:      file_read_stdin_unicode_translation_error_list_mode,
   78:      file_read_line_stdin_unicode_translation_error_binary_mode,
   79:      file_read_line_stdin_unicode_translation_error_list_mode,
   80:      io_get_chars_stdin_binary_mode,
   81:      io_get_chars_stdin_list_mode,
   82:      io_get_until_stdin_binary_mode,
   83:      io_get_until_stdin_list_mode,
   84:      io_get_chars_file_read_stdin_binary_mode,
   85:      file_read_stdin_latin1_binary_mode,
   86:      file_read_stdin_latin1_list_mode,
   87:      io_fwrite_stdin_latin1_mode
   88:     ].
   89: 
   90: groups() -> 
   91:     [].
   92: 
   93: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   94:     Term = os:getenv("TERM", "dumb"),
   95:     os:putenv("TERM","vt100"),
   96:     DefShell = rtnode:get_default_shell(),
   97:     [{default_shell,DefShell},{term, Term}|Config].
   98: 
   99: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  100:     Term = proplists:get_value(term,Config),
  101:     os:putenv("TERM",Term),
  102:     ok.
  103: 
  104: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  105:     Config.
  106: 
  107: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  108:     Config.
  109: 
  110: -record(state, {
  111:                 q = [],
  112:                 nxt = eof,
  113:                 mode = list
  114:                }).
  115: 
  116: uprompt(_L) ->
  117:     [1050,1072,1082,1074,1086,32,1077,32,85,110,105,99,111,100,101,32,63].
  118: 
  119: %% Test that an Unicode prompt does not crash the shell.
  120: unicode_prompt(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  121:     PA = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  122:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
  123: 	new ->
  124: 	    rtnode:run(
  125:               [{putline,""},
  126:                {putline, "2."},
  127:                {expect, "[\n ]2"},
  128:                {putline, "shell:prompt_func({io_proto_SUITE,uprompt})."},
  129:                {expect, "[\n ]default"},
  130:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  131:                {putline, "hej"},
  132:                {expect, "\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
  133:                {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true}])."},
  134:                {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
  135:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  136:                {putline, "hej"},
  137:                {expect,"[\n ]hej"},
  138:                {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"}
  139:               ],[],"",["-pa",PA]);
  140:         _ ->
  141:             ok
  142:     end,
  143:     %% And one with oldshell
  144:     rtnode:run(
  145:       [{putline,""},
  146:        {putline, "2."},
  147:        {expect, "[\n ]2"},
  148:        {putline, "shell:prompt_func({io_proto_SUITE,uprompt})."},
  149:        {expect, "default"},
  150:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  151:        {putline, "hej"},
  152:        {expect, "\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
  153:        {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true}])."},
  154:        {expect, "[\n ]\\?*ok"},
  155:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  156:        {putline, "hej"},
  157:        {expect,"[\n ]\\?*hej"},
  158:        {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"}
  159:       ],[],"",["-oldshell","-pa",PA]),
  160:     ok.
  161: 
  162: %% Test that an Unicode prompt does not crash the shell.
  163: shell_slogan(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  164:     PA = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  165:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
  166: 	new ->
  167: 	    rtnode:run(
  168:               [{expect, "\\Q"++string:trim(erlang:system_info(system_version))++"\\E"},
  169:                {expect, "\\Q"++io_lib:format("Eshell V~s (press Ctrl+G to abort, type help(). for help)",[erlang:system_info(version)])++"\\E"}
  170:               ],[],"",[]),
  171:       	    rtnode:run(
  172:               [{expect, "\nTest slogan"},
  173:                {expect, "\nTest session slogan \\("}
  174:               ],[],"",["-stdlib","shell_slogan","\"Test slogan\"",
  175:                        "-stdlib","shell_session_slogan","\"Test session slogan\""]),
  176:       	    rtnode:run(
  177:               [{expect, "\nTest slogan"},
  178:                {expect, "\\Q\nTest session slogan (\\E"}
  179:               ],[],"",["-stdlib","shell_slogan","fun io_proto_SUITE:slogan/0",
  180:                        "-stdlib","shell_session_slogan","fun io_proto_SUITE:session_slogan/0",
  181:                        "-pa",PA]);
  182:         _ ->
  183:             ok
  184:     end.
  185: 
  186: slogan() ->
  187:     "Test slogan".
  188: session_slogan() ->
  189:     "Test session slogan".
  190: 
  191: %% Check io:setopts and io:getopts functions.
  192: setopts_getopts(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  193:     FileName = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
  194: 			      "io_proto_SUITE_setopts_getopts.dat"]),
  195:     {ok,WFile} = file:open(FileName,[write]),
  196:     Server = start_io_server_proxy(),
  197:     [{binary, false}] = io:getopts(Server),
  198:     [getopts] = proxy_getall(Server),
  199:     [{binary,false},{encoding,latin1}] = lists:sort(io:getopts(WFile)),
  200:     proxy_setnext(Server,"Hej"),
  201:     "Hej" = io:get_line(Server,''),
  202:     proxy_setnext(Server,"Hej"++[532]),
  203:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_line(Server,''),
  204:     ok = io:setopts(Server,[{binary,true}]),
  205:     proxy_setnext(Server,"Hej"),
  206:     <<"Hej">> = io:get_line(Server,''),
  207:     proxy_setnext(Server,"Hej"++[532]),
  208:     <<72,101,106,200,148>> = io:get_line(Server,''),
  209:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~ts",[<<72,101,106,200,148>>])),
  210:     file:write(WFile,<<"HejA">>),
  211:     file:write(WFile,unicode:characters_to_binary("Hej"++[532],unicode,unicode)),
  212:     file:write(WFile,unicode:characters_to_binary("Hej"++[532],unicode,{utf16,big})),
  213:     file:write(WFile,unicode:characters_to_binary("Hej"++[532],unicode,{utf16,little})),
  214:     file:write(WFile,unicode:characters_to_binary("Hej"++[532],unicode,{utf32,big})),
  215:     file:write(WFile,unicode:characters_to_binary("Hej"++[532],unicode,{utf32,little})),
  216:     file:close(WFile),
  217:     {ok,RFile} = file:open(FileName,[read]),
  218:     [{binary,false},{encoding,latin1}] = lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  219:     [$H,$e,$j,$A] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  220:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,unicode}]),
  221:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  222:     [{binary,false},{encoding,unicode}] = lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  223:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf16,big}}]),
  224:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  225:     [{binary,false},{encoding,{utf16,big}}] =
  226: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  227:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf16,little}}]),
  228:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  229:     [{binary,false},{encoding,{utf16,little}}] =
  230: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  231:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf32,big}}]),
  232:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  233:     [{binary,false},{encoding,{utf32,big}}] =
  234: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  235:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf32,little}}]),
  236:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  237:     [{binary,false},{encoding,{utf32,little}}] =
  238: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  239:     eof = io:get_line(RFile,''),
  240:     file:position(RFile,0),
  241:     io:setopts(RFile,[{binary,true},{encoding,latin1}]),
  242:     <<$H,$e,$j,$A>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  243:     [{binary,true},{encoding,latin1}] = lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  244:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,unicode}]),
  245:     <<$H,$e,$j,532/utf8>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  246:     [{binary,true},{encoding,unicode}] = lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  247:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf16,big}}]),
  248:     <<$H,$e,$j,532/utf8>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  249:     [{binary,true},{encoding,{utf16,big}}] =
  250: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  251:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf16,little}}]),
  252:     <<$H,$e,$j,532/utf8>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  253:     [{binary,true},{encoding,{utf16,little}}] =
  254: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  255:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf32,big}}]),
  256:     <<$H,$e,$j,532/utf8>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  257:     [{binary,true},{encoding,{utf32,big}}] =
  258: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  259:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf32,little}}]),
  260:     <<$H,$e,$j,532/utf8>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  261:     [{binary,true},{encoding,{utf32,little}}] =
  262: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  263:     eof = io:get_line(RFile,''),
  264:     file:close(RFile),
  265:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
  266: 	new ->
  267: 	    %% So, lets test another node with new interactive shell
  268: 	    rtnode:run(
  269:               [{putline,""},
  270:                {putline, "2."},
  271:                {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
  272:                {putline, "lists:keyfind(binary,1,io:getopts())."},
  273:                {expect, "{binary,false}"},
  274:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  275:                {putline, "hej"},
  276:                {expect, "\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
  277:                {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true}])."},
  278:                {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
  279:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  280:                {putline, "hej"},
  281:                {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"},
  282:                {putline, "proplists:get_value(terminal,io:getopts())."},
  283:                {expect, "true"},
  284:                {putline, "proplists:get_value(stdin,io:getopts())."},
  285:                {expect, "true"},
  286:                {putline, "proplists:get_value(stdout,io:getopts())."},
  287:                {expect, "true"},
  288:                {putline, "proplists:get_value(stderr,io:getopts())."},
  289:                {expect, "true"}
  290:               ],[]);
  291:         _ ->
  292:             ok
  293:     end,
  294:     %% And one with oldshell
  295:     rtnode:run(
  296:       [{putline,""},
  297:        {putline, "2."},
  298:        {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
  299:        {putline, "lists:keyfind(binary,1,io:getopts())."},
  300:        {expect, "[\n ]{binary,false}"},
  301:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  302:        {putline, "hej"},
  303:        {expect, "\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
  304:        {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true}])."},
  305:        {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
  306:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  307:        {putline, "hej"},
  308:        {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"},
  309:        {putline, "proplists:get_value(terminal,io:getopts())."},
  310:        {expect, "true"},
  311:        {putline, "proplists:get_value(stdin,io:getopts())."},
  312:        {expect, "true"},
  313:        {putline, "proplists:get_value(stdout,io:getopts())."},
  314:        {expect, "true"},
  315:        {putline, "proplists:get_value(stderr,io:getopts())."},
  316:        {expect, "true"}
  317:       ],[],"",["-oldshell"]),
  318: 
  319:     %% Test that terminal options when used in non-terminal
  320:     %% are returned as they should
  321:     Erl = ct:get_progname(),
  322:     Str = os:cmd(Erl ++ " -noshell -eval \"io:format(~s'~p.',[io:getopts()])\" -s init stop"),
  323:     maybe
  324:         {ok, T, _} ?= erl_scan:string(Str),
  325:         {ok, Opts} ?= erl_parse:parse_term(T),
  326:         ?assertEqual(false, proplists:get_value(terminal,Opts)),
  327:         ?assertEqual(false, proplists:get_value(stdin,Opts)),
  328:         ?assertEqual(false, proplists:get_value(stdout,Opts)),
  329:         ?assertEqual(false, proplists:get_value(stderr,Opts))
  330:     else
  331:         _ -> ct:fail({failed_to_parse, Str})
  332:     end,
  333:     ok.
  334: 
  335: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read works when io is in binary mode
  336: file_read_stdin_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  337:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(fun() -> file:read(standard_io, 3) end, [binary]),
  338: 
  339:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "abc"),
  340:     {ok, "got: <<\"abc\">>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  341:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "def"),
  342:     {ok, "got: <<\"def\">>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  343:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  344:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  345: 
  346:     ok.
  347: 
  348: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read works when io is in binary mode
  349: file_read_stdin_list_mode(_Config) ->
  350:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(fun() -> file:read(standard_io, 3) end, [list]),
  351: 
  352:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "abc"),
  353:     {ok, "got: \"abc\"\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  354:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "def"),
  355:     {ok, "got: \"def\"\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  356:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  357:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  358: 
  359:     ok.
  360: 
  361: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read returns
  362: %% correct error when in binary mode
  363: file_read_stdin_unicode_translation_error_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  364:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(fun() -> file:read(standard_io, 3) end, [binary]),
  365: 
  366:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<"ęö€"/utf8>>),
  367:     {ok, "error: {no_translation,unicode,latin1}\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  368:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  369:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  370: 
  371:     ok.
  372: 
  373: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read returns
  374: %% correct error when in list mode
  375: file_read_stdin_unicode_translation_error_list_mode(_Config) ->
  376:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(fun() -> file:read(standard_io, 3) end, [list]),
  377: 
  378:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<"ęö€"/utf8>>),
  379:     {ok, "error: {no_translation,unicode,latin1}\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  380:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  381:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  382: 
  383:     ok.
  384: 
  385: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read_line works when \r is sent without \n
  386: file_read_line_stdin_cr_without_nl(_Config) ->
  387:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(fun() -> file:read_line(standard_io) end, []),
  388: 
  389:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "abc\r"),
  390:     {error,timeout} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 2000),
  391:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "def\r\n"),
  392:     {ok, ~S'got: <<"abc\rdef\r\n">>\n'} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  393:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  394:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  395: 
  396:     ok.
  397: 
  398: 
  399: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read_line returns
  400: %% correct error when in binary mode
  401: file_read_line_stdin_unicode_translation_error_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  402:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(fun() -> file:read_line(standard_io) end, [binary]),
  403: 
  404:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<"ę\nö\n€"/utf8>>),
  405:     {ok, "error: {no_translation,unicode,latin1}\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  406:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  407:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  408: 
  409:     ok.
  410: 
  411: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read_line returns
  412: %% correct error when in list mode
  413: file_read_line_stdin_unicode_translation_error_list_mode(_Config) ->
  414:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(fun() -> file:read_line(standard_io) end, [list]),
  415: 
  416:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<"ę\nö\n€"/utf8>>),
  417:     {ok, "error: {no_translation,unicode,latin1}\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  418:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  419:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  420: 
  421:     ok.
  422: 
  423: %% Test that reading from stdin using io:get_chars works when io is in binary mode
  424: io_get_chars_stdin_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  425:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(
  426:                          fun() ->
  427:                                  case io:get_chars(standard_io, "", 1) of
  428:                                      eof -> eof;
  429:                                      Chars -> {ok, Chars}
  430:                                  end
  431:                          end, [binary]),
  432: 
  433:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "x\n"),
  434:     {ok, "got: <<\"x\">>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  435:     {ok, "got: <<\"\\n\">>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  436:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  437:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  438: 
  439:     ok.
  440: 
  441: %% Test that reading from stdin using custom io_request works when io is in binary mode
  442: io_get_until_stdin_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  443: 
  444:     GetUntilEof =
  445:         fun() ->
  446:                 IoServer = group_leader(),
  447:                 IoServer !
  448:                     {io_request,
  449:                      self(),
  450:                      IoServer,
  451:                      {get_until, unicode, '', ?MODULE, get_until_eof, []}},
  452:                 receive
  453:                     {io_reply, IoServer, Data} ->
  454:                         {ok, Data}
  455:                 end
  456:         end,
  457: 
  458:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(GetUntilEof, [binary]),
  459: 
  460:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "x\n"),
  461:     {error, timeout} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 250),
  462:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  463:     {ok, "got: <<\"x\\n\">>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  464: 
  465:     {ok, P2, ErlPort2} = start_stdin_node(GetUntilEof, [binary]),
  466: 
  467:     {error, timeout} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 250),
  468:     ErlPort2 ! {self(), close},
  469:     {ok, "got: eof\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0),
  470: 
  471:     ok.
  472: 
  473: %% Test that reading from stdin using custom io_request works when io is in list mode
  474: io_get_until_stdin_list_mode(_Config) ->
  475: 
  476:     GetUntilEof =
  477:         fun() ->
  478:                 IoServer = group_leader(),
  479:                 IoServer !
  480:                     {io_request,
  481:                      self(),
  482:                      IoServer,
  483:                      {get_until, unicode, '', ?MODULE, get_until_eof, []}},
  484:                 receive
  485:                     {io_reply, IoServer, Data} ->
  486:                         {ok, Data}
  487:                 end
  488:         end,
  489: 
  490:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(GetUntilEof, [list]),
  491: 
  492:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "x\n"),
  493:     {error, timeout} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 250),
  494:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  495:     {ok, "got: \"x\\n\"\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  496: 
  497:     {ok, P2, ErlPort2} = start_stdin_node(GetUntilEof, [list]),
  498: 
  499:     {error, timeout} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 250),
  500:     ErlPort2 ! {self(), close},
  501:     {ok, "got: eof\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0),
  502: 
  503:     ok.
  504: 
  505: get_until_eof([],eof) -> {done,eof,[]};
  506: get_until_eof(ThisFar,eof) -> {done,ThisFar,eof};
  507: get_until_eof(ThisFar,CharList) -> {more,ThisFar++CharList}.
  508: 
  509: %% Test that reading from stdin using io:get_chars works when io is in list mode
  510: io_get_chars_stdin_list_mode(_Config) ->
  511:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(
  512:                          fun() -> case io:get_chars(standard_io, "", 1) of
  513:                                       eof -> eof;
  514:                                       Chars -> {ok, Chars}
  515:                                   end
  516:                          end, [list]),
  517: 
  518:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "x\n"),
  519:     {ok, "got: \"x\"\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  520:     {ok, "got: \"\\n\"\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  521:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  522:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  523: 
  524:     ok.
  525: 
  526: %% Test that mixing io:get_chars and file:read works when stdin is in binary mode.
  527: io_get_chars_file_read_stdin_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  528:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(
  529:                          fun() -> case file:read(standard_io, 1) of
  530:                                       eof -> eof;
  531:                                       {ok, Chars} ->
  532:                                           case io:get_line(standard_io, "") of
  533:                                               eof -> Chars;
  534:                                               Line ->
  535:                                                   {ok, [Chars, Line]}
  536:                                           end
  537:                                   end
  538:                          end, [binary]),
  539: 
  540:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, "1\n"),
  541:     {ok, "got: [<<\"1\">>,<<\"\\n\">>]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  542:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  543:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  544: 
  545:     ok.
  546: 
  547: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read_line works when io is not utf8
  548: file_read_stdin_latin1_binary_mode(_Config) ->
  549:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(
  550:                          fun() -> file:read_line(standard_io) end,
  551:                          [binary],
  552:                          "-kernel standard_io_encoding latin1"),
  553: 
  554:     %% Invalid utf8
  555:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<192,128,10,192,128,10,192,128,10>>),
  556: 
  557:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  558:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  559:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  560:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  561:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  562: 
  563:     {ok, P2, ErlPort2} = start_stdin_node(
  564:                          fun() -> file:read(standard_io, 5) end,
  565:                          [binary],
  566:                          "-kernel standard_io_encoding latin1"),
  567: 
  568:     %% Valid utf8
  569:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort2, <<"duπaduπaduπa"/utf8>>),
  570: 
  571:     {ok, "got: <<100,117,207,128,97>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  572:     {ok, "got: <<100,117,207,128,97>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  573:     {ok, "got: <<100,117,207,128,97>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  574:     ErlPort2 ! {self(), close},
  575:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  576: 
  577:     %% Setting using io:setopts used to hang on Windows, see #7459 for details.
  578:     {ok, P3, ErlPort3} = start_stdin_node(
  579:                          fun() -> file:read_line(standard_io) end,
  580:                          [binary],
  581:                          "-eval \"io:setopts([{encoding, latin1}])\""),
  582: 
  583:     %% Invalid utf8
  584:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort3, <<192,128,10,192,128,10,192,128,10>>),
  585: 
  586:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P3, 0, 5000),
  587:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P3, 0, 5000),
  588:     {ok, "got: <<192,128,10>>\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P3, 0, 5000),
  589:     ErlPort3 ! {self(), close},
  590:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P3, 0, 5000),
  591: 
  592:     ok.
  593: 
  594: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read_line works when io is not utf8
  595: file_read_stdin_latin1_list_mode(_Config) ->
  596:     {ok, P, ErlPort} = start_stdin_node(
  597:                          fun() -> file:read_line(standard_io) end,
  598:                          [list],
  599:                          "-kernel standard_io_encoding latin1"),
  600: 
  601:     %% Invalid utf8
  602:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<192,128,10,192,128,10,192,128,10>>),
  603: 
  604:     {ok, "got: [192,128,10]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  605:     {ok, "got: [192,128,10]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  606:     {ok, "got: [192,128,10]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  607:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  608:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  609: 
  610:     {ok, P2, ErlPort2} = start_stdin_node(
  611:                          fun() -> file:read(standard_io, 5) end,
  612:                          [list],
  613:                          "-kernel standard_io_encoding latin1"),
  614: 
  615:     %% Valid utf8
  616:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort2, <<"duπaduπaduπa"/utf8>>),
  617: 
  618:     {ok, "got: [100,117,207,128,97]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  619:     {ok, "got: [100,117,207,128,97]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  620:     {ok, "got: [100,117,207,128,97]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  621:     ErlPort2 ! {self(), close},
  622:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P2, 0, 5000),
  623: 
  624:     ok.
  625: 
  626: %% Test that reading from stdin using file:read works when io is not utf8,
  627: %% but unicode is printed out
  628: io_fwrite_stdin_latin1_mode(_Config) ->
  629:     {ok, P, ErlPort} =
  630:         start_stdin_node(
  631:           fun() -> case file:read(standard_io, 5) of
  632:                        {ok, Chars} ->
  633:                            %% We've read a unicode string as latin1,
  634:                            %% which means that if we convert it to
  635:                            %% a binary it will be seen as the original
  636:                            %% unicode string.
  637:                            io:format("~ts",[list_to_binary(Chars)]),
  638:                            {ok, Chars};
  639:                        Else ->
  640:                            Else
  641:                    end
  642:           end,
  643:           [list],
  644:           "-kernel standard_io_encoding latin1"),
  645: 
  646:     %% Valid utf8
  647:     erlang:port_command(ErlPort, <<"duπa"/utf8>>),
  648: 
  649:     {ok, "got: [100,117,207,128,97]\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  650:     receive
  651:         {ErlPort, {data, Data}} ->
  652:             %% On stdout any unicode should be translated to hex syntax
  653:             "du\\x{3C0}a" = Data
  654:     end,
  655: 
  656:     ErlPort ! {self(), close},
  657:     {ok, "got: eof"} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0, 5000),
  658: 
  659:     ok.
  660: 
  661: start_stdin_node(ReadFun, IoOptions) ->
  662:     start_stdin_node(ReadFun, IoOptions, "").
  663: start_stdin_node(ReadFun, IoOptions, ExtraArgs) ->
  664:     {ok, L} = gen_tcp:listen(0,[{active, false},{packet,4}]),
  665:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
  666:     Cmd = lists:append(
  667:             [ct:get_progname(),
  668:              " -noshell ",
  669:              ExtraArgs,
  670:              " -pa ", filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  671:              " -s ", atom_to_list(?MODULE), " read_raw_from_stdin ", integer_to_list(Port)]),
  672:     ct:log("~p~n", [Cmd]),
  673:     ErlPort = open_port({spawn, Cmd}, [stream, eof, stderr_to_stdout,
  674:                                        {env, [{"LC_CTYPE","en_US.UTF-8"}]}]),
  675:     {ok, P} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
  676:     gen_tcp:send(P, term_to_binary(IoOptions)),
  677:     gen_tcp:send(P, term_to_binary(ReadFun)),
  678:     {ok, P, ErlPort}.
  679: 
  680: read_raw_from_stdin([Port]) ->
  681:     try
  682:         {ok, P} = gen_tcp:connect(localhost, list_to_integer(atom_to_list(Port)),
  683:                                   [binary, {packet, 4}, {active, false}]),
  684:         {ok, OptionsBin} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  685:         io:setopts(standard_io, binary_to_term(OptionsBin)),
  686:         {ok, ReadFunBin} = gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  687:         spawn(fun() ->
  688:                       gen_tcp:recv(P, 0),
  689:                       init:stop("crash")
  690:               end),
  691:         read_raw_from_stdin(binary_to_term(ReadFunBin), P)
  692:     catch E:R:ST ->
  693:             io:format(standard_error, "~p  ~p",[Port,{E,R,ST}])
  694:     end.
  695: read_raw_from_stdin(ReadFun, P) ->
  696:     case ReadFun() of
  697:         eof ->
  698:             gen_tcp:send(P, "got: eof"),
  699:             init:stop();
  700:         {ok, Char} ->
  701:             gen_tcp:send(P, unicode:characters_to_binary(
  702:                               io_lib:format("got: ~p\n",[Char]))),
  703:             read_raw_from_stdin(ReadFun, P);
  704:         {ok, Fmt, Char} ->
  705:             gen_tcp:send(P, unicode:characters_to_binary(
  706:                               io_lib:format("got: "++Fmt++"\n",[Char]))),
  707:             read_raw_from_stdin(ReadFun, P);
  708:         {error, Reason} ->
  709:             gen_tcp:send(P, unicode:characters_to_binary(
  710:                               io_lib:format("error: ~p\n",[Reason]))),
  711:             read_raw_from_stdin(ReadFun, P)
  712:     end.
  713: 
  714: get_lc_ctype() ->
  715:     case {os:type(),os:version()} of
  716: 	{{unix,sunos},{5,N,_}} when N =< 8 ->
  717: 	    "iso_8859_1";
  718: 	_ ->
  719: 	    "ISO-8859-1"
  720:     end.
  721: 
  722: %% Test various unicode options.
  723: unicode_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  724:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config),
  725:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
  726:     %% A string in both russian and greek characters, which is present
  727:     %% in all the internal test files (but in different formats of course)...
  728:     TestData = [1090,1093,1077,32,1073,1080,1075,32,
  729: 		1088,1077,1076,32,1092,1086,1100,32,1093,
  730: 		1072,1089,32,1089,1086,1100,32,932,951,949,
  731: 		32,946,953,947,32,961,949,948,32,
  732: 		963,959,967,32,945,961,949,32,966,959,967,949,963],
  733:     %% Testdata from Chinese open source customer, that triggered OTP-7974
  734:     TestData2 = [46,46,46,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,
  735: 		 12411,12370,12411,12370,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,12411,12370,
  736: 		 12411,12370,44,44,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,44,12411,12370,12411,
  737: 		 12370,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,12411,
  738: 		 12370,12411,12370,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,44,44,10],
  739: 
  740:     %% The external test files are generated with a BOM writing
  741:     %% text editor. A shorter line is written (with two characters 
  742:     %% larger than 127).
  743:     ExternalTestData = [197,116,101,114,101,114,246,118,114,97],
  744:     InternalBomFiles = ["testdata_utf8_bom.dat",
  745: 			"testdata_utf16_big_bom.dat",
  746: 			"testdata_utf16_little_bom.dat",
  747: 			"testdata_utf32_big_bom.dat",
  748: 			"testdata_utf32_little_bom.dat"],
  749:     AllNoBom = [{utf8,"testdata_utf8.dat"},
  750: 		{utf16,"testdata_utf16_big.dat"},
  751: 		{{utf16,big},"testdata_utf16_big.dat"},
  752: 		{{utf16,little},"testdata_utf16_little.dat"},
  753: 		{utf32,"testdata_utf32_big.dat"},
  754: 		{{utf32,big},"testdata_utf32_big.dat"},
  755: 		{{utf32,little},"testdata_utf32_little.dat"}],
  756:     ExternalBomFiles = ["external_utf8_bom.dat",
  757: 			"external_utf16_little_bom.dat",
  758: 			"external_utf16_big_bom.dat"],
  759:     ReadBomFile = fun(File,Dir) ->
  760: 			  {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([Dir,File]),
  761: 					     [read,binary]),
  762: 			  {ok,Bin} = file:read(F,4),
  763: 			  {Type,Bytes} = unicode:bom_to_encoding(Bin),
  764: 			  file:position(F,Bytes),
  765: 			  io:setopts(F,[{encoding,Type}]),
  766: 			  R = unicode:characters_to_list(
  767: 				io:get_chars(F,'',length(TestData)),unicode),
  768: 			  file:close(F),
  769: 			  R
  770: 		  end,
  771:     ReadBomlessFile = fun({Type,File},DataLen,Dir) ->
  772: 			      {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([Dir,File]),
  773: 						 [read,binary,
  774: 						  {encoding,Type}]),
  775: 			      R = unicode:characters_to_list(
  776: 				    io:get_chars(F,'',DataLen),unicode),
  777: 			      file:close(F),
  778: 			      R
  779: 		      end,
  780:     ReadBomlessFileList = fun({Type,File},DataLen,Dir) ->
  781: 				  {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([Dir,File]),
  782: 						     [read,
  783: 						      {encoding,Type}]),
  784: 				  R = io:get_chars(F,'',DataLen),
  785: 				  file:close(F),
  786: 				  R
  787: 			  end,
  788:     ReadBomlessFileListLine = fun({Type,File},Dir) ->
  789: 				      {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([Dir,File]),
  790: 							 [read,
  791: 							  {encoding,Type}]),
  792: 				      R = io:get_line(F,''),
  793: 				      file:close(F),
  794: 				      R
  795: 			      end,
  796:     [TestData = ReadBomFile(F,DataDir) || F <- InternalBomFiles ],
  797:     [ExternalTestData = ReadBomFile(F,DataDir) || F <- ExternalBomFiles ],
  798:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFile(F,length(TestData),DataDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  799:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFileList(F,length(TestData),DataDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  800:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFileListLine(F,DataDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  801: 
  802:     BomDir = filename:join([PrivDir,"BOMDATA"]),
  803:     BomlessDir = filename:join([PrivDir,"BOMLESSDATA"]),
  804:     file:make_dir(BomDir),
  805:     file:make_dir(BomlessDir),
  806: 
  807:     WriteBomFile = fun({Enc,File},Dir) ->
  808: 			   {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([Dir,File]),
  809: 					      [write,binary]),
  810: 			   file:write(F,unicode:encoding_to_bom(Enc)),
  811: 			   io:setopts(F,[{encoding,Enc}]),
  812: 			   io:put_chars(F,TestData),
  813: 			   file:close(F),
  814: 			   ok
  815: 		   end,
  816:     [ ok = WriteBomFile(F,BomDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  817:     [TestData = ReadBomFile(F,BomDir) || {_,F} <- AllNoBom ],
  818:     WriteBomlessFile = fun({Enc,File},TData,Dir) ->
  819: 			       {ok,F} = file:open(
  820: 					  filename:join([Dir,File]),
  821: 					  [write,binary,{encoding,Enc}]),
  822: 			       io:put_chars(F,TData),
  823: 			       file:close(F),
  824: 			       ok
  825: 		       end,
  826:     [ ok = WriteBomlessFile(F,TestData,BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  827:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFile(F,length(TestData),BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  828:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFileList(F,length(TestData),BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  829:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFileListLine(F,BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  830: 
  831:     CannotReadFile = fun({Enc,File},Dir) ->
  832: 			     %%io:format(standard_error,"~s\r\n",[filename:join([Dir,File])]),
  833: 			     {ok,F} = file:open(
  834: 					filename:join([Dir,File]),
  835: 					[read,binary,{encoding,Enc}]),
  836: 			     Enc2 = case Enc of
  837: 					utf8 ->
  838: 					    unicode;
  839: 					Tpl when is_tuple(Tpl) ->
  840: 					    Tpl;
  841: 					Atom when is_atom(Atom) ->
  842: 					    {Atom, big}
  843: 				    end,
  844: 			     {error, {no_translation,Enc2,latin1}} = 
  845: 				 file:read(F,10),
  846: 			     {error,terminated} = io:get_chars(F,'',10),
  847: 			     ok
  848: 		     end,
  849:     [ ok = CannotReadFile(F,DataDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  850:     [ ok = CannotReadFile(F,BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  851:     [ ok = CannotReadFile(F,BomDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  852: 
  853:     [ ok = WriteBomlessFile(F,TestData2,BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  854:     [TestData2 = ReadBomlessFile(F,length(TestData2),BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  855:     [TestData2 = ReadBomlessFileList(F,length(TestData2),BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  856:     [TestData2 = ReadBomlessFileListLine(F,BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  857: 
  858: 
  859:     FailDir = filename:join([PrivDir,"FAIL"]),
  860:     file:make_dir(FailDir),
  861: 
  862:     CannotWriteFile = fun({_Enc,File},Dir) ->
  863: 			      {ok,F} = file:open(
  864: 					 filename:join([Dir,File]),
  865: 					 [write,binary]),
  866: 			      {'EXIT', {no_translation,_}} =
  867: 				  (catch io:put_chars(F,TestData)),
  868: 			      {'EXIT', {terminated,_}} = (catch io:put_chars(F,TestData)),
  869: 			      ok
  870: 		      end,
  871:     [ ok = CannotWriteFile(F,FailDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  872: 
  873:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
  874: 	new ->
  875: 	    %% OK, time for the group_leaders...
  876: 	    rtnode:run(
  877:               [{putline,""},
  878:                {putline, "2."},
  879:                {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
  880:                {putline, "lists:keyfind(encoding,1,io:getopts())."},
  881:                {expect, "{encoding,latin1}"},
  882:                {putline, "io:format(\"~ts~n\",[[1024]])."},
  883:                {expect, "\\Q\\x{400}\\E"},
  884:                {putline, "io:setopts([unicode])."},
  885:                {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
  886:                {putline, "io:format(\"~ts~n\",[[1024]])."},
  887:                {expect, "[\n ]"++[1024]}
  888:               ],[],"",["-env","LC_ALL",get_lc_ctype()]);
  889:         _ ->
  890:             ok
  891:     end,
  892:     rtnode:run(
  893:       [{putline,""},
  894:        {putline, "2."},
  895:        {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
  896:        {putline, "lists:keyfind(encoding,1,io:getopts())."},
  897:        {expect, "[\n ]{encoding,latin1}"},
  898:        {putline, "io:format(\"~ts~n\",[[1024]])."},
  899:        {expect, "\\Q\\x{400}\\E"},
  900:        {putline, "io:setopts([{encoding,unicode}])."},
  901:        {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
  902:        {putline, "io:format(\"~ts~n\",[[1024]])."},
  903:        {expect, "[\n ]"++[1024]}
  904:       ],[],"",
  905:       ["-oldshell","-env","LC_ALL",get_lc_ctype()]),
  906:     ok.
  907: 
  908: %% Tests various unicode options on random generated files.
  909: unicode_options_gen(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  910:     ct:timetrap({minutes,30}), %% valgrind needs a alot of time
  911:     rand:seed(default),
  912:     io:format("*** SEED: ~p ***\n", [rand:export_seed()]),
  913:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  914:     AllModes = [utf8,utf16,{utf16,big},{utf16,little},
  915: 		utf32,{utf32,big},{utf32,little}],
  916:     FSize = 9*1024,
  917:     NumItersRead = 2,
  918:     NumItersWrite = 2,
  919:     Dir = filename:join(PrivDir, "GENDATA1"),
  920:     file:make_dir(Dir),
  921: 
  922:     DoOneFile1 =
  923: 	fun(Encoding, N, M) ->
  924: 		?dbg({Encoding,M,N}),
  925: 		io:format("Read test: Encoding ~p, Chunk size ~p, Iteration ~p~n",[Encoding,M,N]),
  926: 		io:format(standard_error,
  927: 			  "Read test: Encoding ~p, Chunk size ~p, Iteration ~p\r\n",[Encoding,M,N]),
  928: 		Fname = filename:join(Dir,
  929: 				      "genfile_"++enc2str(Encoding)++
  930: 					  "_"++integer_to_list(N)),
  931: 		Ulist = random_unicode(FSize),
  932: 		Bin = unicode:characters_to_binary(Ulist, utf8, Encoding),
  933: 		ok = file:write_file(Fname, Bin),
  934: 
  935: 		Read1 = fun(FD) -> io:get_line(FD, '') end,
  936: 		Res1 = read_whole_file(Fname,
  937: 				       [read,read_ahead,{encoding,Encoding}],
  938: 				       Read1),
  939: 
  940: 		Read2 = fun(FD) -> io:get_chars(FD, '', M) end,
  941: 		Res2 = read_whole_file(Fname,
  942: 				       [read,binary,
  943: 					read_ahead,{encoding,Encoding}],
  944: 				       Read2),
  945: 
  946: 		Read3 = fun(FD) ->
  947: 				case io:fread(FD, '', "~ts") of
  948: 				    {ok,D} -> D;
  949: 				    Other -> Other end
  950: 			end,
  951: 		Res3 = read_whole_file(Fname,
  952: 				       [read,binary,
  953: 					read_ahead,{encoding,Encoding}],
  954: 				       Read3),
  955: 
  956: 		Read4 = fun(FD) ->
  957: 				case io:fread(FD, '', "~ts") of
  958: 				    {ok,D} -> D;
  959: 				    Other -> Other end
  960: 			end,
  961: 		Res4 = read_whole_file(Fname,
  962: 				       [read,read_ahead,{encoding,Encoding}],
  963: 				       Read4),
  964: 
  965: 		Ulist2 = [X || X <- Ulist, X =/= $\n, X =/= $\s, X =/= $\t],
  966: 		Ulist = done(Res1),
  967: 		Ulist = done(Res2),
  968: 		Ulist2 = done(Res3),
  969: 		Ulist2 = done(Res4),
  970: 
  971: 		file:delete(Fname)
  972: 	end,
  973:     [ [ [ DoOneFile1(E, N, M) || E <- AllModes ] ||
  974: 	  M <- [10,1000,128,1024,8192,8193] ] ||
  975: 	N <- lists:seq(1, NumItersRead) ],
  976: 
  977:     DoOneFile2 =
  978: 	fun(Encoding,N,M) ->
  979: 		?dbg({Encoding,M,N}),
  980: 		io:format("Write test: Encoding ~p, Chunk size ~p, Iteration ~p~n",[Encoding,M,N]),
  981: 		io:format(standard_error,
  982: 			  "Write test: Encoding ~p, Chunk size ~p, Iteration ~p\r\n",[Encoding,M,N]),
  983: 		Fname = filename:join(Dir,
  984: 				      "genfile_"++enc2str(Encoding)++
  985: 					  "_"++integer_to_list(N)),
  986: 		Ulist = random_unicode(FSize),
  987: 
  988: 		Res1 = write_read_file(Fname, 1,
  989: 				       [write],
  990: 				       Encoding,
  991: 				       fun(FD) -> io:put_chars(FD, Ulist) end),
  992: 
  993: 		Res2 = write_read_file(Fname, 2,
  994: 				       [write,binary],
  995: 				       Encoding,
  996: 				       fun(FD) -> io:put_chars(FD, Ulist) end),
  997: 
  998: 		Fun3 = fun(FD) ->
  999: 			       _ = [io:format(FD, "~tc", [C]) || C <- Ulist],
 1000: 			       ok
 1001: 		       end,
 1002: 		Res3 = write_read_file(Fname, 3,
 1003: 				       [write],
 1004: 				       Encoding,
 1005: 				       Fun3),
 1006: 
 1007: 		Fun4 = fun(FD) ->
 1008: 			       io:put_chars(FD,
 1009: 					    unicode:characters_to_binary(Ulist))
 1010: 		       end,
 1011: 		Res4 = write_read_file(Fname, 4,
 1012: 				       [write],
 1013: 				       Encoding,
 1014: 				       Fun4),
 1015: 
 1016: 		LL = string:tokens(Ulist, "\n"),
 1017: 		Fun5 = fun(FD) ->
 1018: 			       _ = [io:format(FD, "~ts", [L]) || L <- LL],
 1019: 			       ok
 1020: 		       end,
 1021: 		Res5 = write_read_file(Fname, 5,
 1022: 				       [write],
 1023: 				       Encoding,
 1024: 				       Fun5),
 1025: 
 1026: 		Ulist2 = lists:flatten(LL),
 1027: 		ResBin = done(Res1),
 1028: 		ResBin = done(Res2),
 1029: 		ResBin = done(Res3),
 1030: 		ResBin = done(Res4),
 1031: 		Ulist = unicode:characters_to_list(ResBin, Encoding),
 1032: 
 1033: 		ResBin2 = done(Res5),
 1034: 		Ulist2 = unicode:characters_to_list(ResBin2, Encoding),
 1035: 
 1036: 		ok
 1037: 	end,
 1038:     [ [ [ DoOneFile2(E, N, M) || E <- AllModes ] ||
 1039: 	  M <- [10,1000,128,1024,8192,8193] ] ||
 1040: 	N <- lists:seq(1, NumItersWrite) ],
 1041:     ok.
 1042: 
 1043: read_whole_file(Fname, Options, Fun) ->
 1044:     do(fun() ->
 1045: 	       do_read_whole_file(Fname, Options, Fun)
 1046:        end).
 1047: 
 1048: do_read_whole_file(Fname, Options, Fun) ->
 1049:     {ok,F} = file:open(Fname, Options),
 1050:     Res = do_read_whole_file_1(Fun, F),
 1051:     ok = file:close(F),
 1052:     unicode:characters_to_list(Res, unicode).
 1053: 
 1054: do_read_whole_file_1(Fun, F) ->
 1055:     case Fun(F) of
 1056: 	eof ->
 1057: 	    [];
 1058: 	{error,Error} ->
 1059: 	    receive after 10000 -> ok end,
 1060: 	    exit(Error);
 1061: 	Other ->
 1062: 	    [Other|do_read_whole_file_1(Fun, F)]
 1063:     end.
 1064: 
 1065: write_read_file(Fname0, N, Options, Enc, Writer) ->
 1066:     Fname = Fname0 ++ "_" ++ integer_to_list(N),
 1067:     do(fun() ->
 1068: 	       do_write_read_file(Fname, Options, Enc, Writer)
 1069:        end).
 1070: 
 1071: do_write_read_file(Fname, Options, Encoding, Writer) ->
 1072:     {ok,F} = file:open(Fname, [{encoding,Encoding}|Options]),
 1073:     Writer(F),
 1074:     ok = file:close(F),
 1075:     {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(Fname),
 1076:     ok = file:delete(Fname),
 1077:     Bin.
 1078: 
 1079: enc2str(Atom) when is_atom(Atom) ->
 1080:     atom_to_list(Atom);
 1081: enc2str({A1,A2}) when is_atom(A1), is_atom(A2) ->
 1082:     atom_to_list(A1)++"_"++atom_to_list(A2).
 1083: 
 1084: 
 1085: random_unicode(0) ->
 1086:     %% io:fread(Device, Promp, "~ts") will return an error if the file
 1087:     %% ends with whitespace characters. This behavior seems to be
 1088:     %% deliberate. Therefore, be sure that we never end the file with
 1089:     %% a sequence of whitespace characters.
 1090:     [$! + rand:uniform(64) |
 1091:      case rand:uniform(20) of
 1092:          A when A =< 1 -> [$\n];
 1093:          _ -> []
 1094:      end];
 1095: random_unicode(N) ->
 1096:     %% Favor large unicode code points and make line breaks.
 1097:     X = case rand:uniform(20) of
 1098: 	    A when A =< 1 -> $\n;
 1099: 	    A when A =< 3 -> rand:uniform(16#10FFFF);
 1100: 	    A when A =< 6 -> rand:uniform(16#10FFFF - 16#7F) + 16#7F;
 1101: 	    A when A =< 12 -> rand:uniform(16#10FFFF - 16#7FF) + 16#7FF;
 1102: 	    _ -> rand:uniform(16#10FFFF - 16#FFFF) + 16#FFFF
 1103: 	end,
 1104:     if
 1105:         X =:= $\r;                            %Can be eaten by io:get_line/2.
 1106:         16#D800 =< X, X =< 16#DFFF;
 1107:         X =:= 16#FFFE;
 1108:         X =:= 16#FFFF ->
 1109: 	    random_unicode(N);
 1110: 	true ->
 1111: 	    [X | random_unicode(N-1)]
 1112:     end.
 1113: 
 1114: 
 1115: %% Test variants with binary option.
 1116: binary_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1117:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config),
 1118:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
 1119:     TestData = unicode:characters_to_binary(
 1120: 		 [1090,1093,1077,32,1073,1080,1075,32,
 1121: 		  1088,1077,1076,32,1092,1086,1100,32,1093,
 1122: 		  1072,1089,32,1089,1086,1100,32,932,951,949,
 1123: 		  32,946,953,947,32,961,949,948,32,
 1124: 		  963,959,967,32,945,961,949,32,966,959,967,949,963]),
 1125:     <<First10:10/binary,Second10:10/binary,_/binary>> = TestData,
 1126:     First10List = binary_to_list(First10),
 1127:     Second10List = binary_to_list(Second10),
 1128:     TestFile = filename:join([DataDir, "testdata_utf8.dat"]),
 1129:     {ok, F} = file:open(TestFile,[read]),
 1130:     {ok, First10List} = file:read(F,10),
 1131:     io:setopts(F,[binary]),
 1132:     {ok, Second10} = file:read(F,10),
 1133:     file:close(F),
 1134:     {ok, F2} = file:open(TestFile,[read,binary]),
 1135:     {ok, First10} = file:read(F2,10),
 1136:     io:setopts(F2,[list]),
 1137:     {ok, Second10List} = file:read(F2,10),
 1138:     file:position(F2,0),
 1139:     First10List = io:get_chars(F2,'',10),
 1140:     io:setopts(F2,[binary]),
 1141:     Second10 = unicode:characters_to_binary(io:get_chars(F2,'',10),unicode,latin1),
 1142:     file:close(F2),
 1143:     LineBreakFileName =  filename:join([PrivDir, "testdata.dat"]),
 1144:     LineBreakTestData = <<TestData/binary,$\n>>,
 1145:     LineBreakTestDataList = binary_to_list(LineBreakTestData),
 1146:     file:write_file(LineBreakFileName,[LineBreakTestData,LineBreakTestData,LineBreakTestData,TestData]),
 1147:     {ok, F3} = file:open(LineBreakFileName,[read]),
 1148:     LineBreakTestDataList = io:get_line(F3,''),
 1149:     io:setopts(F3,[binary]),
 1150:     LineBreakTestData =  unicode:characters_to_binary(io:get_line(F3,''),unicode,latin1),
 1151:     io:setopts(F3,[list]),
 1152:     LineBreakTestDataList = io:get_line(F3,''),
 1153:     io:setopts(F3,[binary]),
 1154:     TestData = unicode:characters_to_binary(io:get_line(F3,''),unicode,latin1),
 1155:     eof = io:get_line(F3,''),
 1156:     file:close(F3),
 1157: 
 1158:     %% OK, time for the group_leaders...
 1159:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
 1160: 	new ->
 1161: 	    rtnode:run(
 1162:               [{putline, "2."},
 1163:                {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
 1164:                {putline, "lists:keyfind(binary,1,io:getopts())."},
 1165:                {expect, "[\n ]{binary,false}"},
 1166:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
 1167:                {putline, "hej"},
 1168:                {expect, "\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
 1169:                {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true},unicode])."},
 1170:                {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
 1171:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
 1172:                {putline, "hej"},
 1173:                {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"},
 1174:                {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
 1175:                {putline, binary_to_list(<<"\345\344\366"/utf8>>)},
 1176:                {expect, latin1, "[\n ]\\Q<<\""++binary_to_list(<<"\345\344\366"/utf8>>)++"\\n\"/utf8>>\\E"}
 1177:               ],[]);
 1178:         _ ->
 1179:             ok
 1180:     end,
 1181:     %% And one with oldshell
 1182:     rtnode:run(
 1183:       [{putline, "2."},
 1184:        {expect, "[\n ]2[^.]"},
 1185:        {putline, "lists:keyfind(binary,1,io:getopts())."},
 1186:        {expect, "[\n ]{binary,false}"},
 1187:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
 1188:        {putline, "hej"},
 1189:        {expect, "[\n ]\\Q\"hej\\n\"\\E"},
 1190:        {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true},unicode])."},
 1191:        {expect, "[\n ]ok"},
 1192:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
 1193:        {putline, "hej"},
 1194:        {expect, "\\Q<<\"hej\\n\">>\\E"},
 1195:        {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
 1196:        {putline, binary_to_list(<<"\345\344\366"/utf8>>)},
 1197:        {expect, latin1, "[\n ]\\Q<<\""++binary_to_list(<<"\345\344\366"/utf8>>)++"\\n\"/utf8>>\\E"}
 1198:       ],[],"",["-oldshell"]),
 1199:     ok.
 1200: 
 1201: answering_machine1(OthNode,OthReg,Me) ->
 1202:     TestDataLine1 = [229,228,246],
 1203:     TestDataUtf = binary_to_list(unicode:characters_to_binary(TestDataLine1)),
 1204:     TestDataLine1Oct = "\\\\345( \b)*\\\\344( \b)*\\\\366",
 1205:     rtnode:run(
 1206:       [{putline,""},
 1207:        {putline, "2."},
 1208:        {expect, "2"},
 1209:        {putline, "io:getopts()."},
 1210:        {expect, ">"},
 1211:        {putline, "{"++OthReg++","++OthNode++"} ! group_leader()."},
 1212:        {expect, "<"},
 1213:        %% get_line
 1214:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1215:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1216:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1217:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1218:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1219:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1220:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1221:        {putline, TestDataLine1},
 1222:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1Oct},
 1223:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1224:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1225:        {putline, TestDataLine1},
 1226:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1Oct},
 1227:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1228:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1229:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1230:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1231:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1232:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1233:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1234:        %% get_chars
 1235:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1236:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1237:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1238:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1239:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1240:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1241:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1242:        {putline, TestDataLine1},
 1243:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1Oct},
 1244:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1245:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1246:        {putline, TestDataLine1},
 1247:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1Oct},
 1248:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1249:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1250:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1251:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1252:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1253:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1254:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1255:        %% fread
 1256:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1257:        {putline, "Hej"},
 1258:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1259:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1260:        {putline, "Hej"},

 1264:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1Oct},
 1265:        {expect, "Okej"},

 1268:        {expect, latin1, "\n" ++ TestDataLine1Oct},
 1269:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1270:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1271:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1272:        {expect, "Okej"},
 1273:        {expect, "Prompt"},
 1274:        {putline, TestDataUtf},
 1275:        {expect, "Okej"}
 1276:

 1360: 
 1361: %% Test various modes when reading from the group leade from another machine.
 1362: read_modes_ogl(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1363:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
 1364: 	noshell ->
 1365: 	    {skipped,"No run_erl"};
 1366: 	_ ->
 1367: 	    read_modes_gl_1(Config,answering_machine2)
 1368:     end.
 1369: 
 1370: %% Test various modes when reading from the group leade from another machine.
 1371: read_modes_gl(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1372:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
 1373: 	noshell ->
 1374: 	    {skipped,"No run_erl"};
 1375: 	old ->
 1376: 	    {skipped,"No new shell"};
 1377: 	_ ->
 1378: 	    read_modes_gl_1(Config,answering_machine1)
 1379:     end.
 1380: 
 1381: read_modes_gl_1(_Config,Machine) ->
 1382:     TestDataLine1 = [229,228,246],
 1383:     TestDataLine1BinUtf = unicode:characters_to_binary(TestDataLine1),
 1384:     TestDataLine1BinLatin = list_to_binary(TestDataLine1),
 1385: 
 1386:     N2List = peer:random_name(?FUNCTION_NAME),
 1387:     MyNodeList = atom2list(node()),
 1388:     register(io_proto_suite,self()),
 1389:     AM1 = spawn(?MODULE,Machine,
 1390: 		[MyNodeList, "io_proto_suite", N2List]),
 1391: 
 1392:     GL = receive X when is_pid(X) -> X end,
 1393:     ?dbg({group_leader,X}),
 1394:     %% get_line
 1395:     receive after 500 -> ok end, % Dont clash with the new shell...
 1396:     "Hej\n" = io:get_line(GL,"Prompt\n"),
 1397:     io:setopts(GL,[binary]),
 1398:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1399:     <<"Hej\n">> = io:get_line(GL,"Prompt\n"),
 1400:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,latin1}]),
 1401:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1402:     TestDataLine1BinLatin = chomp(io:request(GL,{get_line,latin1,"Prompt\n"})),
 1403:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1404:     TestDataLine1BinUtf = chomp(io:get_line(GL,"Prompt\n")),
 1405:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,unicode}]),
 1406: 
 1407:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1408:     TestDataLine1BinLatin = chomp(io:request(GL,{get_line,latin1,"Prompt\n"})),
 1409:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1410:     TestDataLine1BinUtf = chomp(io:get_line(GL,"Prompt\n")),
 1411:     io:setopts(GL,[list]),
 1412:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1413: 
 1414:     %%get_chars
 1415:     "Hej" = io:get_chars(GL,"Prompt\n",3),
 1416:     io:setopts(GL,[binary]),
 1417:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1418:     <<"Hej">> = io:get_chars(GL,"Prompt\n",3),
 1419:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,latin1}]),
 1420:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1421:     TestDataLine1BinLatin = io:request(GL,{get_chars,latin1,"Prompt\n",3}),
 1422:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1423:     TestDataLine1BinUtf = io:get_chars(GL,"Prompt\n",3),
 1424:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,unicode}]),
 1425: 
 1426:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1427:     TestDataLine1BinLatin = io:request(GL,{get_chars,latin1,"Prompt\n",3}),
 1428:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1429:     TestDataLine1BinUtf = io:get_chars(GL,"Prompt\n",3),
 1430:     io:setopts(GL,[list]),
 1431:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1432:     %%fread
 1433:     {ok,["Hej"]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1434:     io:setopts(GL,[binary]),
 1435:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1436:     {ok,["Hej"]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1437:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,latin1}]),
 1438:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1439:     {ok,[TestDataLine1]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1440:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1441:     {ok,[TestDataLine1]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1442:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,unicode}]),
 1443:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1444:     {ok,[TestDataLine1]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1445:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1446:     {ok,[TestDataLine1]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
 1447:     io:setopts(GL,[list]),
 1448:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
 1449: 
 1450: 
 1451:     receive
 1452: 	{AM1,done} ->
 1453: 	    ok
 1454:     after 5000 ->
 1455: 	    exit(timeout)
 1456:     end,
 1457:     ok.
 1458: 
 1459: logging_gl(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1460: 
 1461:     AssertString = fun(Match) ->
 1462:                            fun F() ->
 1463:                                    ?MODULE ! {get, self()},
 1464:                                    receive
 1465:                                        {put_chars, _, M} ->
 1466:                                            case string:find(M, Match) of
 1467:                                                nomatch -> io:format("~p~n",[M]), F();
 1468:                                                _ -> ok
 1469:                                            end
 1470:                                    after 500 -> timeout end
 1471:                            end
 1472:                    end,
 1473: 
 1474:     rtnode:run(
 1475:       [{putline,""},
 1476:        {putline, "2."},
 1477:        {expect, "[\n ]2"},
 1478:        {eval, fun() ->
 1479:                       Device = spawn(
 1480:                                  fun F() ->
 1481:                                          receive
 1482:                                              {get, Parent} ->
 1483:                                                  receive {io_request, From, ReplyAs, M} ->
 1484:                                                          Parent ! M,
 1485:                                                          From ! {io_reply, ReplyAs, ok}
 1486:                                                  after 500 ->
 1487:                                                          Parent ! timeout
 1488:                                                  end,
 1489:                                                  F()
 1490:                                          end
 1491:                                  end),
 1492:                       register(?MODULE, Device),
 1493:                       ok = logger:add_handler(default, logger_std_h, #{ filter_default => stop, config => #{ type => {device, Device} }}),
 1494:                       ok = io:setopts(user, [{log,true}])
 1495:               end},
 1496:        {putline, "io:format(user,\"abc\n\",[])."},
 1497:        {expect, "abc\r\nok"},
 1498:        {eval, fun() -> ?MODULE ! {get, self()}, receive timeout -> ok; M -> {unexpected_message, M} end end},
 1499:        {eval, fun() -> ok = logger:add_handler_filter(default, stderr, {fun logger_filters:domain/2, {log, sub, [otp, kernel, io]}}) end},
 1500:        {putline, "io:format(user,\"abc\n\",[])."},
 1501:        {expect, "abc\r\nok"},
 1502:        {eval, AssertString("put_chars,unicode,\"abc\\n\"")},
 1503: 
 1504:        {putline, "io:setopts([{log,true}])."},
 1505:        {expect, "\r\nok"},
 1506:        {eval, AssertString("get_until")},
 1507:        {putline, "io:get_line(\"prompt: \")."},
 1508:        {expect, "prompt: "},
 1509:        {eval, AssertString("get_line")},
 1510:        {putline, "def"},
 1511:        {expect, "\\Q\"def\\n\"\\E"},
 1512: 
 1513:        {eval, fun() -> ok = logger:set_primary_config(level, info) end}
 1514:       ],[],"",
 1515:       ["-pz",filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 1516:        "-oldshell",
 1517:        "-connect_all","false",
 1518:        "-kernel","logger_level","all",
 1519:        "-kernel","logger","[{handler, default, undefined}]",
 1520:        "-kernel","shell_history","disabled",
 1521:        "-kernel","prevent_overlapping_partitions","false"]),
 1522:     ok.
 1523: 
 1524: %% Test behaviour when reading broken Unicode files
 1525: broken_unicode(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1526:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
 1527:     Latin1Name = filename:join([Dir,"latin1_data_file.dat"]),
 1528:     Utf8Name = filename:join([Dir,"utf8_data_file.dat"]),
 1529:     Latin1Data = iolist_to_binary(lists:duplicate(10,lists:seq(0,255)++[255,255,255])),
 1530:     Utf8Data = unicode:characters_to_binary(
 1531: 		 lists:duplicate(10,lists:seq(0,255))),
 1532:     file:write_file(Latin1Name,Latin1Data),
 1533:     file:write_file(Utf8Name,Utf8Data),
 1534:     [ latin1 = heuristic_encoding_file2(Latin1Name,N,utf8) || N <- lists:seq(1,100)++[1024,2048,10000]],
 1535:     [ utf8 = heuristic_encoding_file2(Utf8Name,N,utf8) || N <- lists:seq(1,100)++[1024,2048,10000]],
 1536:     [ latin1 = heuristic_encoding_file2(Latin1Name,N,utf16) || N <- lists:seq(1,100)++[1024,2048,10000]],
 1537:     [ latin1 = heuristic_encoding_file2(Latin1Name,N,utf32) || N <- lists:seq(1,100)++[1024,2048,10000]],
 1538:     ok.
 1539: 
 1540: 
 1541: %%
 1542: %% From the cookbook, more or less
 1543: heuristic_encoding_file2(FileName,Chunk,Enc) ->
 1544:     {ok,F} = file:open(FileName,[read,binary,{encoding,Enc}]),
 1545:     loop_through_file2(F,io:get_chars(F,'',Chunk),Chunk,Enc).
 1546: 
 1547: loop_through_file2(_,eof,_,Enc) ->
 1548:     Enc;
 1549: loop_through_file2(_,{error,_Err},_,_) ->
 1550:     latin1;
 1551: loop_through_file2(F,Bin,Chunk,Enc) when is_binary(Bin) ->
 1552:     loop_through_file2(F,io:get_chars(F,'',Chunk),Chunk,Enc).
 1553: 
 1554: %% Test eof before newline on stdin when erlang is in pipe.
 1555: eof_on_pipe(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1556:     case {ct:get_progname(),os:type()} of
 1557: 	{Erl,{unix,linux}} ->
 1558: 	    %% Not even Linux is reliable - echo can be both styles
 1559: 	    try
 1560: 		EchoLine = case os:cmd("echo -ne \"test\\ntest\"") of
 1561: 			       "test\ntest" ->
 1562: 				   "echo -ne \"a\\nbu\" | ";
 1563: 			       _ ->
 1564: 				   case os:cmd("echo \"test\\ntest\\c\"") of
 1565: 				       "test\ntest" ->
 1566: 					   "echo \"a\\nbu\\c\" | ";
 1567: 				       _ ->
 1568: 					   throw(skip)
 1569: 				   end
 1570: 			   end,
 1571: 		CommandLine1 = EchoLine ++
 1572: 		    "\""++Erl++"\" -noshell -eval  "
 1573: 		    "'io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]),"
 1574: 		    "io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]),"
 1575: 		    "io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]).' -run init stop",
 1576: 		case os:cmd(CommandLine1) of
 1577: 		    "\"a\\n\"\"bu\"eof" ->
 1578: 			ok;
 1579: 		    Other1 ->
 1580: 			exit({unexpected1,Other1})
 1581: 		end,
 1582: 		CommandLine2 = EchoLine ++
 1583: 		    "\""++Erl++"\" -noshell -eval  "
 1584: 		    "'io:setopts([binary]),io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]),"
 1585: 		    "io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]),"
 1586: 		    "io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]).' -run init stop",
 1587: 		case os:cmd(CommandLine2) of
 1588: 		    "<<\"a\\n\">><<\"bu\">>eof" ->
 1589: 			ok;
 1590: 		    Other2 ->
 1591: 			exit({unexpected2,Other2})
 1592: 		end
 1593: 	    catch
 1594: 		throw:skip ->
 1595: 		    {skipped,"unsupported echo program"}
 1596: 	    end;
 1597: 	{_,_} ->
 1598: 	    {skipped,"Only on linux"}
 1599:     end.
 1600: 
 1601: raw_stdout(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1602:     Cmd = lists:append(
 1603:             [ct:get_progname(),
 1604:              " -noshell -noinput",
 1605:              " -pa ", filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 1606:              " -s ", atom_to_list(?MODULE), " write_raw_to_stdout"]),
 1607:     ct:log("~p~n", [Cmd]),
 1608:     Port = open_port({spawn, Cmd}, [stream, eof]),
 1609:     Expected = lists:seq(0,255),
 1610:     Expected = get_all_port_data(Port, []),
 1611:     Port ! {self(), close},
 1612:     ok.
 1613: 
 1614: get_all_port_data(Port, Acc) ->
 1615:     receive
 1616:         {Port, {data, Data}} ->
 1617:             get_all_port_data(Port, [Acc|Data]);
 1618:         {Port, eof} ->
 1619:             lists:flatten(Acc)
 1620:     end.
 1621: 
 1622: write_raw_to_stdout() ->
 1623:     try
 1624:         ok = io:setopts(standard_io, [{encoding, latin1}]),
 1625:         ok = file:write(standard_io, lists:seq(0,255)),
 1626:         halt(0)
 1627:     catch
 1628:         Class:Reason:StackTrace ->
 1629:             io:format(standard_error, "~p~p~p", [Class, Reason, StackTrace]),
 1630:             halt(17)
 1631:     end.
 1632: 
 1633: raw_stdout_isatty(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1634:     rtnode:run(
 1635:         [{putline,"io:setopts(group_leader(), [{encoding, latin1}])."},
 1636:          {putline,"file:write(group_leader(),[90, 127, 128, 255, 131, 90, 10])."},%
 1637:          {expect, "\\QZ^?\\200\\377\\203Z\\E"}
 1638:         ],[]),
 1639:         ok.
 1640: %%
 1641: %% Test I/O-server
 1642: %%
 1643: 
 1644: start_io_server_proxy() ->
 1645:     spawn_link(?MODULE,io_server_proxy,[#state{}]).
 1646: 
 1647: proxy_getall(Pid) ->
 1648:     req(Pid,{self(),getall}).
 1649: proxy_setnext(Pid,Data) when is_list(Data) ->
 1650:     req(Pid,{self(),next,Data}).
 1651: proxy_quit(Pid) ->
 1652:     req(Pid,{self(),quit}).
 1653: 
 1654: req(Pid,Mess) ->
 1655:     Pid ! Mess,
 1656:     receive
 1657: 	{Pid, Answer} ->
 1658: 	    Answer
 1659:     after 5000 ->
 1660: 	    exit(timeout)
 1661:     end.
 1662: 
 1663: io_server_proxy(State) -> 
 1664:     receive
 1665:         {io_request, From, ReplyAs, Request} ->
 1666:             case request(Request,State) of
 1667:                 {Tag, Reply, NewState} when Tag =:= ok; Tag =:= error ->
 1668:                     reply(From, ReplyAs, Reply),
 1669:                     io_server_proxy(NewState);
 1670:                 {stop, Reply, _NewState} ->
 1671:                     reply(From, ReplyAs, Reply),
 1672:                     exit(Reply)
 1673:             end;
 1674:         %% Private message
 1675:         {From, next, Data} ->
 1676:             From ! {self(), ok},
 1677:             io_server_proxy(State#state{nxt = Data});
 1678:         {From, getall} ->
 1679:             From ! {self(), lists:reverse(State#state.q)},
 1680:             io_server_proxy(State#state{q=[]});
 1681:         {From, quit} ->
 1682:             From ! {self(), lists:reverse(State#state.q)},
 1683: 	    ok;
 1684:         _Unknown ->
 1685:             io_server_proxy(State)
 1686:     end.
 1687: 
 1688: reply(From, ReplyAs, Reply) ->
 1689:     From ! {io_reply, ReplyAs, Reply}.
 1690: 
 1691: request({put_chars, Encoding, Chars}, State) ->
 1692:     {ok, ok, State#state{q=[{put_chars, Encoding, Chars} | State#state.q ]}};
 1693: request({put_chars, Encoding, Module, Function, Args}, State) ->
 1694:     {ok, ok, State#state{q=[{put_chars, Encoding, Module, Function, Args} | 
 1695: 			    State#state.q ]}};
 1696: request({get_until, Encoding, Prompt, M, F, As}, State) ->
 1697:     {ok, convert(State#state.nxt, Encoding, State#state.mode), State#state{nxt = eof, q = [{get_until, Encoding, Prompt, M, F, As} | State#state.q]}};
 1698: request({get_chars, Encoding, Prompt, N}, State) ->
 1699:     {ok, convert(State#state.nxt, Encoding, State#state.mode), State#state{nxt = eof, 
 1700: 									   q = [{get_chars, Encoding, Prompt, N} |
 1701: 										State#state.q]}};
 1702: request({get_line, Encoding, Prompt}, State) ->
 1703:     {ok, convert(State#state.nxt, Encoding, State#state.mode), 
 1704:      State#state{nxt = eof, 
 1705: 		 q = [{get_line, Encoding, Prompt} | 
 1706: 		      State#state.q]}};
 1707: request({get_geomentry,_}, State) ->
 1708:     {error, {error,enotsup}, State};
 1709: request({setopts, Opts}, State) when Opts =:= [{binary, false}]; Opts =:= [list] ->
 1710:     {ok, ok, State#state{q=[{setopts, Opts} | State#state.q ], mode = list}};
 1711: request({setopts, Opts}, State) when Opts =:= [{binary, true}]; Opts =:= [binary] ->
 1712:     {ok, ok, State#state{q=[{setopts, Opts} | State#state.q ], mode = binary}};
 1713: request(getopts, State) ->
 1714:     {ok, case State#state.mode of
 1715: 	     list -> [{binary,false}];
 1716: 	     binary -> [{binary, true}]
 1717: 	 end, State#state{q=[getopts | State#state.q ]}};
 1718: request({requests, Reqs}, State) ->
 1719:     multi_request(Reqs, {ok, ok, State}).
 1720: 
 1721: multi_request([R|Rs], {ok, _Res, State}) ->
 1722:     multi_request(Rs, request(R, State));
 1723: multi_request([_|_], Error) ->
 1724:     Error;
 1725: multi_request([], State) ->
 1726:     State.
 1727: 
 1728: convert(Atom,_,_) when is_atom(Atom) ->
 1729:     Atom;
 1730: convert(Data, unicode, list) ->
 1731:     unicode:characters_to_list(Data,unicode);
 1732: convert(Data, latin1, list) ->
 1733:     try
 1734: 	L = unicode:characters_to_list(Data, unicode),
 1735: 	[ true = Ch =< 255 || Ch <- L ],
 1736: 	L
 1737:     catch
 1738: 	_:_ ->
 1739: 	    {error, {cannot_convert, unicode, latin1}}
 1740:     end;
 1741: convert(Data, unicode, binary) ->
 1742:     unicode:characters_to_binary(Data,unicode,unicode);
 1743: convert(Data, latin1, binary) ->
 1744:     case unicode:characters_to_binary(Data, unicode, latin1) of
 1745: 	Bin when is_binary(Bin) ->
 1746: 	    Bin;
 1747: 	_ ->
 1748: 	    {error, {cannot_convert, unicode, latin1}}
 1749:     end.
 1750: 
 1751: atom2list(A) ->
 1752:     lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~w", [A])).
 1753: 
 1754: chomp([]) ->
 1755:     [];
 1756: chomp([$\n]) ->
 1757:     [];
 1758: chomp([H|T]) ->
 1759:     [H|chomp(T)];
 1760: chomp(<<>>) ->
 1761:     <<>>;
 1762: chomp(<<$\n>>) ->
 1763:     <<>>;
 1764: chomp(<<Ch,Rest/binary>>) ->
 1765:     X = chomp(Rest),
 1766:     <<Ch,X/binary>>;
 1767: chomp(Atom) ->
 1768:     Atom.
 1769: 
 1770: do(Fun) ->
 1771:     {_,Ref} = spawn_monitor(fun() ->
 1772: 				    exit(Fun())
 1773: 			    end),
 1774:     Ref.
 1775: 
 1776: done(Ref) ->
 1777:     receive
 1778: 	{'DOWN',Ref,process,_,Result} ->
 1779: 	    Result
 1780:     end.
